mapper.insert: insert into tb_teacher (tt_id, tt_name, tt_subject_id, tt_phone, tt_del, tt_created_date, tt_updated_date) values (#{ttId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttSubjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ttPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ttCreatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{ttUpdatedDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update tb_teacher set tt_name = #{ttName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tt_subject_id = #{ttSubjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tt_phone = #{ttPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tt_del = #{ttDel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tt_created_date = #{ttCreatedDate,jdbcType=DATE}, tt_updated_date = #{ttUpdatedDate,jdbcType=DATE} where tt_id = #{ttId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tt_id, tt_name, tt_subject_id, tt_phone, tt_del, tt_created_date, tt_updated_date from tb_teacher
